Open-source projects that are fully GPLv3-compliant may use FullCalendar Premium freely under the GPLv3 license

This project is AGPL licensed, and as such, uses a FullCalendar premium
plugin (adaptive) under the GPL license. The complete license text
is attached above.

The `schedulederLicenseKey` is set to GPL-My-Project-Is-Open-Source
at https://github.com/blr-today/website/blob/main/js/calendar-render.js#L45-L47
to confirm the same.
